Title: Urashima Tarou (supposed title)
Description: ['Urashima Tarou is based on a well-known Japanese folk tale about an honest fisherman who is invited to an underwater castle after saving a sea turtle on a beach from bullies.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: forum.bcdb.com)', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Note, ': The latest research has revealed that the film identified on this website as Urashima Tarou (supposed title), which was so named on the basis that it was believed to be a work by Seitaro Kitayama that was originally released in 1918, is actually a different film. ', Read more..., ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Japanese Animated Film Classics)', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Note, ': Urashima Tarou (supposed title) is tinted in pink film. Not to be mistaken with Urashima Tarou (1931) which is a black and white film.', ' ', ' ']
